definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Reductant in the reaction of elements in valence increased.
sentences.chinese: 在反應中還原劑中元素的化合價升高。

sentences.english: The valences of copper are 1 and 2.
The reaction in which the valence of elements raises or downs is redox reaction.
sentences.chinese: 有元素化合價升降的反應是氧化還原反應。
